banner.title: Use of Cookies
banner.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to browse, you agree to our cookie policy.

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.description: Manage your cookie preferences. You can enable or disable different types of cookies below.
preferences.essentialDescription: These cookies are necessary for the basic functioning of the site and cannot be disabled.
preferences.analyticsDescription: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the site by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.content: We use cookies for various purposes, including improving site functionality, analyzing traffic, and personalizing content.

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.essential: Essential Cookies: Necessary for basic operation
typesOfCookies.analytics: Analytics Cookies: To understand how you use the site
typesOfCookies.preferences: Preference Cookies: To remember your settings

manageCookies.title: Manage Cookies
manageCookies.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies already on your computer and configure most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about our cookie policy, please contact us.
